hero.title: Professional Team Headshots for Real Estate
hero.subtitle: Consistent, listing-ready headshots for every agent. No studio days. No mismatched photos.

painPoints.title: Why Real Estate Teams Struggle with Team Photos

items.title: Remote agents never available
items.description: Coordinating schedules across multiple offices is nearly impossible. By the time everyone's available, you've already hired new agents.

items.title: Inconsistent branding across MLS
items.description: Each agent's photo looks different - different backgrounds, lighting, and quality. It weakens your brokerage brand.

items.title: High photographer costs per agent
items.description: $250-500 per person adds up fast, especially with seasonal teams and high turnover rates in real estate.

painPoints.solution: TeamShotsPro solves all of this in 60 seconds.

useCases.title: Where Real Estate Teams Use Their Headshots

items.quote: We onboarded 50 agents in one afternoon. Total game changer for our brokerage.
items.author: Sarah J.

items.quote: Finally, our MLS listings all look consistent. Clients notice the difference.
items.author: Michael R.

items.quote: New agents get their headshots same day they join. No more waiting for photo day.
items.author: Jennifer L.

items.question: What should real estate agents wear?
items.answer: Business casual works best - blazers, collared shirts, or professional tops. Avoid busy patterns and stick to solid colors that photograph well.

items.question: Can we use these on MLS listings?
items.answer: Yes. Our AI headshots meet all MLS photo requirements and are indistinguishable from traditional photography.

items.question: How do we onboard remote agents?
items.answer: Send them an invite link via email or text. They can submit their selfie from anywhere - even between showings.

items.question: Do you offer brokerage-wide deals?
items.answer: Yes. We offer volume discounts for larger teams. Contact us for enterprise pricing on 50+ seats.

items.question: What if an agent doesn't like their result?
items.answer: Our 100% Human-Look Guarantee means unlimited regenerations until they're happy. We don't stop until it looks perfect.
